member.name: T:WebLibrary.LetterFolderCustomFileNameGenerator
member.summary: A ICustomFileNameGenerator that puts each file into a subfolder under the specified location that is named for the first letter of the file.
member.remarks: For example, given a file "Test Results.xls" the resulting location would be "\t\Test Results.xls".

member.name: M:WebLibrary.LetterFolderCustomFileNameGenerator.GenerateFileName(NickLee.Common.UploadedFile)
member.summary: 设置上传到服务器文件名称
